hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: based in Stockholm.
hero.description: I build high-performance, accessible web applications with Angular, Javascript, React, Next.js and TypeScript. Currently looking for my next challenge in Sweden's tech ecosystem.

about.heading: About Me
about.summary: I am a Frontend Developer with 5+ years of experience architecting robust solutions for the BFSI and Logistics sectors. My expertise lies in modernizing legacy systems‚Äîmost recently leading a complex migration from jQuery to Angular 14 for a client.
about.detailedDescription: Based in Stockholm, I specialize in building scalable **Micro-Frontends** and high-performance web applications. I bridge the gap between complex backend logic and intuitive user experiences.

projects.title: Rule Engine & Dynamic Pricing
projects.description: Architected a high-scale rule engine for real-time special offers. Led the migration of legacy jQuery interfaces to a modern Angular 14 architecture, consuming complex internal APIs.

projects.title: Micro-Frontend Insurance Platform
projects.description: Developed a private banking insurance application from scratch using Module Federation. Created a shared UI library as an NPM package to ensure design consistency across micro-frontends.

projects.title: Loan Origination System (MSME)
projects.description: Built an end-to-end loan management system covering lead entry to automated disbursement. Integrated E-sign and E-Nach APIs for seamless digital contract execution.

projects.title: CMMS Maintenance Platform
projects.description: Engineered a system to track and schedule maintenance for heavy construction equipment across multiple global sites, focusing on production stability and system enhancements.

projects.title: Commercial Vehicle Loan System
projects.description: Automated credit scoring and collateral valuation. Integrated external asset valuation services and CIBIL APIs to determine real-time loan eligibility for commercial clients.

projects.title: Automated Cloud Backup Solution
projects.description: Developed a C#-based utility to automate SQL Server database backups directly to Google Drive on a scheduled basis, ensuring data redundancy and recovery.

experience.description: Leading migrations and developing micro-frontends for global BFSI clients like Citi.
Focused on HR management systems and candidate verification workflows.
Developed automated loan origination systems and integrated external financial APIs.
Built school management solutions and automated cloud backup utilities.

contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.description: Currently open to new opportunities in Stockholm. Feel free to reach out via email or connect on LinkedIn.
